channel.title: Blah blah blah does not exist. Failed compiling.......again
channel.description:
I keep getting this error when I try running ANY auto Script. I have SRL 2.4 and downloaded all the includes manually from both Star's thread and the program. I have extracted all the files into the correct position. I have un-installed and re-installed the files 4 times. Btw im using Windows XP home....any help?
example:
Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\includes\srl/srl.scar does not exist. Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\includes\srl/srl/skill/fighting.scar does not exist. Failed when compiling

item.title: Blah blah blah does not exist. Failed compiling.......again

Thanks for your help sir.

item.title: Blah blah blah does not exist. Failed compiling.......again
item.dc:creator: @Mad_Cow Mad Cow
item.description:
@Mad_Cow wrote:

[quote=“Nisoten, post:1, topic:6345”]I keep getting this error when I try running ANY auto Script. I have SRL 2.4 and downloaded all the includes manually from both Star’s thread and the program. I have extracted all the files into the correct position. I have un-installed and re-installed the files 4 times. Btw im using Windows XP home…any help?

example:

Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\includes\srl/srl.scar does not exist.
Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\includes\srl/srl/skill/fighting.scar does not exist.
Failed when compiling[/quote]

Download SRL and extract all of it to includes. Make sure the folders are likes so
Includes -> SRL/SRL.scar
Includes -> SRL/SRL/core/******.scar
Includes -> SRL/SRL/skill/Fighting.scar

Get SRL here - http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,6520.0.html
Hope it helped,
Mad Cow

Read full topic
